response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal goals. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you at a price of $1,150,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and my asking price, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction and benefit. I understand that making such a decision requires thoughtful consideration, so please take your time to evaluate the proposal. Should you have any questions or require further information, feel free to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1150000}
